question: you are going on a short course to a training college abroad. it is college that you have not been to before write a letter to the accomodation officer in your letter, give details of your course and your arrival/departure date, explain your accomodation needs, ask for information about getting to and from the college
text: I am writing to inform you that, I will attend the course  Business Communication which will be held from 26th Feb 2022 to 29 Feb 2022 at Concordia University.

I will arrive in the morning on 25th Feb 2022. It is a request, could you please provide me with the details of accommodation. I need one  separate room which has an attached bathroom, if it is possible or otherwise, I can share it with one partner. Moreover, I would like to know the way of payment, is it possible to use a visa card.

Apart from this, I have one question regarding transportation, how I can reach from the accommodation to the college do you have any private buses, or do  I have to use some other public transportation. It could be appreciated if you will help in.
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon. Thank you for your time and effort in making accommodation for me.
